function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The potential exploitation of urban-rural relationships leading to adverse events","Impact":"Undermining the capacity of rural areas to deal with adverse events and creating exploitative relationships","Mitigation":"Implement fair trade practices and policies that promote equitable urban-rural interactions","Technologies":"Smart agriculture and monitoring technologies","People":"Rural communities, urban populations, and local governments","Owner":"Local governments, policy-makers, and urban planners"},{"Description":"Decline in tax base of cities encouraging engagement in collaboration networks of cities","Impact":"Reduced resources for individual cities and increased reliance on collaboration networks","Mitigation":"Implement policies to diversify revenue sources and support cities in financial distress","Technologies":"Smart financial management and revenue optimization tools","People":"City governments, urban planners, and financial institutions","Owner":"City governments and financial institutions"},{"Description":"Increased reliance on smart solutions and ICTs for urban operations and quality of life improvement","Impact":"Greater vulnerability to cyber attacks, data privacy breaches, and dependence on technology","Mitigation":"Invest in cybersecurity measures and data protection policies, and diversify non-digital solutions","Technologies":"Cybersecurity solutions and data encryption technologies","People":"Urban populations, businesses, and government agencies","Owner":"Technology companies, government agencies, and cybersecurity experts"}]}
